Sentencas: Metallic supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) are considered as a durable and cost effective alternative to the state-of-the-art ceramic supported cell designs.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to understand the mass and charge transport in the metal-support of this new type of cell a novel technique involving X-ray tomography and micro-structural modelling is presented in this work.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The simulation technique comprises a novel treatment of the boundary conditions, which leads to more accurate effective transport parameters compared to those, which can be achieved with the conventional homogenisation procedures.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the porosity distribution in the metal-support was determined, which provided information about the inhomogeneous nature of the material.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition to that, transport parameters for two identified, different dense layers of the metal-support are evaluated separately.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results of the evaluation show three significant findings.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Firstly, that the effective transport parameters are up to a factor of 20 lower compared to other SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Secondly, that the microstructure can have regions, which are much denser, especially the first 100 mu m of the interface between gas-channel and support-structure.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thirdly, that the calculation of the transport parameters depends on the correct application of boundary conditions.
Titulo: Numerical evaluation of micro-structural parameters of porous supports in metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells
